title: My Little Happiness - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Drama   Childhood Friends   Doctors   Fated Lovers   Hospital   Lawyers   Lovers Reunited
author: Dong Ben Xi Gu   东奔西顾
description:
Wen Shaoqing, a gentle doctor, when seeing the patient and quick-responsed when doing operation. He never thought that there is a woman in the world telling him that she would protect him in her field.

Cong Rong, a capable lawyer, is famous in lawyer circle with her sharp tongue. She never thought that there is a man named Wen Shaoqing would make her speechless yet sweet in heart. As Wen says, “the deep love will be cherished even from afar. I love you.”>
